name: NANO (Geglo, Nebn3b)
description:
The game is better played with high volume (music is sick!), a large screen, and downloaded on your operating system.

TIP:  You can only dash in the air.

Dr. Oshiro is a Japanese inventor who has created a civilization of Nanobots called New Nanobot City. However, one rogue nanobot threatens it all. To combat this problem, Dr. Oshiro employs Nano to save the city before it is too late.

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement and jump

SPACE - Dash

SHIFT - Slide

LEFT MOUSE - Melee

Q - Reboot

Programming, 2D Art, Level Design, Writing -> Geg

Programming, Music, SFX, Implementation, Writing -> Neboo

Playtesting -> Xrbeaky

This game was created by the LJHS' Digital Arts and Code Club.
